entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is mentioned as Harry's beloved, indicating a close relationship. ("this time it was his beloved Regulus who sailed with him to the island")

entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is mentioned as being ordered by Regulus, indicating a master-slave relationship. ("Master Regulus took from his pocket a locket... And he told Kreacher to take it")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who is disgusted by the idea of drinking poison. ("And he made you drink the poison? said Harry, disgusted.")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's hands are mentioned as leaping to her mouth in surprise. ("Hermione’s hands leapt to her mouth: She seemed to have understood something.")

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is mentioned as having a locket similar to the one Regulus took. ("Master Regulus took from his pocket a locket like the one the Dark Lord had")

entities.name: basin of poison
entities.description: The basin of poison is mentioned as being on the island. ("with its basin of poison.")

relationships.description: Regulus ordered Kreacher to take a locket and switch it with the one in the basin. ("And he told Kreacher to take it and, when the basin was empty, to switch the lockets")
Regulus drank all the potion from the basin. ("And he drank — all the potion — and Kreacher swapped the lockets")
Kreacher swapped the lockets with the one in the basin. ("And he drank — all the potion — and Kreacher swapped the lockets")
Regulus took a locket similar to the one the Dark Lord had. ("Master Regulus took from his pocket a locket like the one the Dark Lord had")
